title: 105_hr4344
content: AUTHORIZATIONS OF APPROPRIATIONS. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to adjust funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes changes to the Federal Council on the Aging, Administration, and Grants for State and Community Programs on Aging. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to adjust funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes changes to the Federal Council on the Aging, Administration, and Grants for State and Community Programs on Aging. The amendments involve updating funding amounts for fiscal years 1999-2001 in subsections (a)(1) and (b) of the Act. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to update funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes adjustments to funding amounts in subsections (d), (e), and (f) of the Act. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to update funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes adjustments to funding amounts in subsections (d), (e), and (f) of the Act. In subsection (d), the funding amounts for surplus commodities are changed to $460,000,000 for each of fiscal years 1999 through 2001. In subsection (e), funding for training, research, and discretionary projects and programs is also updated. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to update funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes adjustments to funding amounts in subsections (a), (b), (f), and (g) of the Act. Funding amounts for community service employment for older Americans and grants for Native Americans are being revised for the specified fiscal years. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to update funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes adjustments to funding amounts in subsections (a), (b), (f), and (g) of the Act. Funding amounts for community service employment for older Americans and grants for Native Americans are being revised for the specified fiscal years. Specifically, U.S.C. 3057n(a) and Section 702 of the Act (42 U.S.C. 3058a) are being amended to reflect the necessary funding for fiscal years 1999 through 2001. The Older Americans Act of 1965 is being amended to update funding allocations for various programs from fiscal years 1992-1995 to fiscal years 1999-2001. This includes adjustments to funding amounts in subsections (c) and (d) of the Act, as well as the Native American Program. Funding amounts are being revised for the specified fiscal years. SEC. 2. TRANSFERS. Section 308(b) of the Older Americans Act of 1965 is amended to adjust funding percentages for different fiscal years. Section 308(b) of the Older Americans Act of 1965 is amended to adjust funding percentages for different fiscal years. In subparagraph (B), changes are made to simplify the language and remove specific references to fiscal year 1996.
